snippet: The new owner of the Cleveland Browns, Jimmy Haslam III, said Tuesday that Mike Holmgren was out as the team president, although he will remain with the franchise to help in the transition.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Jimmy Haslam III, moments after his purchase of the Cleveland Browns is approved by the NFL, announces that he will replace team president Mike Holmgren with former Philadelphia Eagles president Joe Banner; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The new owner of the Cleveland Browns, Jimmy Haslam III, said Tuesday that Mike Holmgren was out as the team president, although he will remain with the franchise to help in the transition.

headline.seo: Browns’ New Owner, Jimmy Haslam III, Demotes Mike Holmgren
headline.main: Holmgren Replaced as the Browns’ President
headline.print_headline: Holmgren Replaced as the Browns’ President
